title: Remove decorative pig plushie images from the Valentine question card

requirements.text: Remove all decorative pig plushie images from the main question card UI by deleting the five absolutely-positioned pig elements currently rendered near the top of the card in frontend/src/components/valentine/ValentineQuestionCard.tsx, so no pig imagery appears anywhere on the question screen.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Question view, no pig plushie images are rendered (no elements referencing /assets/generated/pig-plushie-*.png).
The rest of the ValentineQuestionCard layout remains functional and visually intact (seal, heart bouquet, message text, and Yes/No buttons still render and work).
No console errors are introduced by the removal of the pig images.

requirements.text: Ensure the pig plushie static image assets are no longer referenced anywhere in the frontend codebase after removal (e.g., search for pig-plushie-bunny.dim_256x256.png, pig-plushie-angel.dim_256x256.png, pig-plushie-stack.dim_256x256.png, pig-plushie-blanket.dim_256x256.png, pig-plushie-external-1.dim_256x256.png).
acceptanceCriteria: A project-wide search shows zero references to the pig plushie filenames in frontend source files after the change.
The app builds and runs without attempting to load any pig plushie images.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not change the seal image, heart bouquet image, the predefined message paragraph, or the Yes/No button copy/behavior.
Do not add new decorative elements as a replacement unless explicitly requested later.
Do not introduce backend changes (Motoko) for this request.
